title: Supply & Delivery of Materials for Sustainable Power Sector Support Project (Expansion of Rural Electrification & Distribution System Improvement Ampara and Uva) - Package -3 - LOT 1B - ABC Accessories  & Tools
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Pavithra Wanniarachchi, Minister of Power and Energy, to award the above tender for a total cost of Euro 226,931.00 plus Rs.541,600.00, was approved by the Cabinet.
